trans-unit.source: The base class for all script reference classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase"></xref> class.

Retrieves the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""></xref> control on the target Web page.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to compress the script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

A string that contains the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
Determines whether the specified script reference is an ASP.NET AJAX script.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the script reference is an ASP.NET AJAX script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler"></xref> object automatically adds code at the end of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) file to call the client NotifyScriptLoaded method of the [Sys.Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) class.

Set the NotifyScriptLoaded property to `false` if you reference a script file in an assembly and the script file already contains code to call [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md).
An error is thrown if [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method is called more than one time from a script file.

If you reference a standalone script file that is not embedded in an assembly, you must include code at the end of the script file to call the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method.
The following example shows the code to include at the end of the script file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) method is automatically called at the end of a JavaScript file, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if user code calls the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method that is already in the JavaScript file.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the path of the referenced client script file, relative to the Web page.
The path of the referenced client script
Replaces the file-name extension in the specified script path to designate a debug script.
This method assumes that the script has a ".js" extension.
It then replaces the extension with ".debug.js".
The full path of the script to rename.
The path must end with ".js".
A string that contains the path of the script with the debug extension.
Gets or sets a comma-delimited list of UI cultures that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*> property.
A string that contains a comma-delimited list of UI cultures.
Gets or sets the version of the client script file (release or debug) to use.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"></xref> value that indicates which version of the client script file to reference.
The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"></xref>.
